reviews.review: Juegazo muy recomendado si te gusta el gore, pura adrenalina, matazombies y pasar un buen rato con tus colegas con el multijugador para hasta 6 jugadores, sobre todo por su alta adicción con variedad de armas, perks, mapas gratuitos y mucho más... y con bastantes logros a desbloquear! 8/10
get it
This game's gonna f-uckin r-ape your a-ss if u don't buy it
Glorious. Like L4D but better in some ways.

This game satisfies the need for a challenging, team-based arcade experience. Pop the heads of a million zombies (specimens) as increasingly larger and larger waves crash upon the bulwarks that are your team's shotguns. Different perks that you level add an additional layer to gameplay. Are you underleveled in your chosen perk for this difficulty? Is demolition appropriate here given what your teammates are playing? It's cheap, and updated with cool new content semi-frequently, give it a go.

This game is you Vs. 100+ zombies. More you kill, the more money you get, better weapons, but then more zombies. Its not L4D, its better beacuse you can have a screen full of zombies. Rather than the handful of L4D.

Best survival horror, you can get today.  Choose from 7 different perks to play with along with a ton of weapons to use against 10 kinds of enemies from spider-like creatures to the big doctor with a chainsaw instead of arm! For someone might be graphics too old, but thats not the reason not to play. WARNING: VERY ADDICTIVE!
Truely a great game to play with your mates. Nothing completes the day like a LAW missle to a Chaingun wielding maniac
Gran juego del género Survival Horror, donde hay que co-operar para salir con vida de las hordas y oleadas de mutantes. Muy recomendable.
Fun coop shooter, if you like zombies and guns..BUY IT!

spectacular, technical, violent and splatter all over limit.
At the beginning can leave a little disoriented, but after that you understood the mechanics, it begin really addictive!!!!
Geballte Action und viel Splatter ein muss für jeden Splatter Fan.
Great game for coop mode! extremely hard and fun for all!

Gory, f*cking metal, hardcore and last but not least freaking funny. You will find yourself spending several hours playing all the maps in any difficulty and testing the wide range of weapons and classes at your dispossal. Give it a try!
Hacking the heads off of zombies with a fire axe never gets boring!!
You should play this game if you like DOSH and LOADSAMONEY

It's fun as hell

Killing Floor: A co - op survival horror game work in teams to survive the hordes of monsters and destroy the final boss

if you like co - op games such as left 4 dead then this game is definatly for you

Lots of fun. Like a survival flash game mixed with a class based shooter.

Get the Christmas package while you can for a great price.

I'll get lots of time out of this game
I didn't know love until I played this game.

du fun, rien que du fun, une sorte de L4D en mieux ! beaucoup de sortes d'ennemis tous plus chiant les un que les autres, beaucoup d'armes et beaucoup de personnage différent, utilisation des dialogues préenregistré (à l'aide, besoin d'argent, merci etc. ) très utile, les commandes sont complètes (limite un peu trop :p ) et....


oh et m. ce jeu est fait à partir de pures barres de fun

A classic FPS for every average Steam User.
Can be difficult in some modes, but also pretty enjoyable for the first-timers.

Great fun with your friends!

Awesome, bloody, albeit sometimes mindless fun. Ever played Survival Mode in Left 4 Dead ? This is just like that but with a perk and leveling system. Maps have a great variety, weapons feel great to use and zombie gore is abundant.
fun game , better than l4d, if you get bored of l4d, try this one
Einfach nice ^^
it's just some coop crazy fun in a bag.
Stop movin' and let me bloody heal you.
Great game, steam treasure !

Este juego es un survival bastante bueno, en la que puedes jugar solo o con el equipo. al final el punto es sobrevivir como sea. muy muy adictivo

If you own left for dead or left for dead 2, this is kind of a must have. A very well thought and technically good game that puts you against hundreds of simple and special zombies in very suggestive maps, with a good community and many servers to play on.

Killing Floor is a first person survival horror game. It is immersed with teamwork and action. Pretty much achievement based, or else there is little to strive for. The achievements are really goal oriented. (This is the reason I play, to get achievements). You can level your perk based on the type of weapons you use, for example, Support Specialist will use shotguns to level its perk. Whileas, a sharpshooters need headshots from crossbow, 9mm handgun, handcannon, M14 EBR, or levered action rifle. You will attempt to survive 10 waves with increasing difficulty of monsters. Really good game to play with with friends.
Vastly improved from launch with tons more content, the best arcadey first person shooter ever made!

Possibly the best money I have spent on a game, particularly for replay value per dollar.  I paid the full $20 for the game and content has nearly doubled since I bought it, all for no cost.  I always buy a few copies when it's on sale and give them to people, if you don't have it yet do yourself a favor and pick it up.
Raw fun blasting zombies/zeds. gets more amusing as you level up and casue more damage.
fun
LOTS OF GUNS AND DOSH!
Really fun game and great alternative to left 4 dead.
L4D meets CS, fuckin awesome
This Game seriously KicK-aSS if you have good team mates and play HardCore, its Trully a Fantastic game if you are into Co-Op Survivals.

I recommend this as a superb cooperative game with a number of great elements, resulting in an enjoyable survival experience with hours of replay value.
Class based zombie killing awesome. Blows L4D out of the water.

good game for teamwork and survival 

i will say 5/5
Fun game I would recommend this to anyone with friends next time it comes on sale
If you're looking for a super intense multiplayer shooter with a great community and some of the best developer support you'll find, then this is the game for you. Cannot recommend this game enough.
ein geiles spiel

Truly, I cannot recommend this game enough.  Hundreds of hours of co-op zombie killing await.

In a co-op twist of the classic Counter Strike model, you kill a wave of crazy mutants with up to 6 friends, purchase better gear, and kill another wave of Zeds till they're all dead!  Combine that with a cross-game persistent class-based perk system, and you'll keep coming back for more!

And on top of all that, the HILARIOUS campy chav-based dialogue, excellent grindcore soundtrack, and goofy/terrifying atmosphere all make this a must buy!  

So what are you waiting for?  DOSH, GET IT WHILE IT'S HOT!
When those clots come for you just gun the fuckers down!
Zombies + Slow mo... need i say more?
Great game from a great developer.
Shoot guns, blat blat.
Awesome game. If Left 4 Dead doesn't offer enough challenge or initiative for teamwork, this is your game. Also, LOADSAMONEY
Zombies. That is all.
If you like floors, and if you like killing on them, then this game is for you.
Awesome game for all those who watches us play it at lansmash

A good game that's had alot of decent treatment since it came out. Alot has been added to it, although it can still be bloody difficult and requires team play. I'd say think of TF2's treatment, but the changes and additions to this have actually been fairly balanced.

Also, British voice actors :D
FLESHPOUUUNNNND.

Like L4D but nothing like L4D. Hard to describe but heaps of fun. It can be a bit daunting at the start but it's an awesome game and the weapons feel deliciously heavyh and chunky. If that makes sense. Shotguns = severe mutilation and/or dismemberment.

One of the best zombie/infected shooters I've played.  Definitely recommend this game for anyone who likes killing zombies, survival FPS games, or squad-oriented gameplay.  Or all of the above.  A great game to play with friends too, either for LAN parties or online.
Démembrements, viscères qui volent, feeling des armes exceptionnel, développeurs attentionnés... Le seul point noir, c'est la répétitivité du titre, mais à tous ceux que ça ne gène pas : achetez-le !

This game is the perfect.
Great challenging gameplay, original specimen design, runs on almost anything, cheap, amazing weapons and a huge selection of said weaponary, great mods and mutators and zombies galore.
Not much more you could ask for. BUY IT.
Great Game and missunderstood (particularly by myself) coop gaming at its best, highly recommended
There are floors. And you must kill on them. So simple, and so awesome.

Brainnnnz. Coop Survival game killing Specimens created in labs. The maps go all over to labs, the streets of london and even santa's workshop. The game can be got for around 5-10 bucks on sale so look for it and have some fun.

Very fun if your looking for a game to keep you on your toes no matter the difficulty and still have time to scare you and  have fun Killing floor is the one for you :) exetremly nice game kept up to date lots of choice and Downloadable content is avaible

Counter-Strike meets Left 4 Dead meets the old Invasion mode from Unreal Tournament. Frequently updated for free, Killing Floor seamlessly mixes RPG elements with a zombie survivor to create one of the best coop experience I've played.
Awesome game, filled with every mannor of burning, shooting and dismembering anything in your way
Best $20 you'll spend

Good zombie killing fun with a faster pace than L4D . Definitely has that backs against the wall last stand feel. Has certainly got more polished since it came out too with developers still working hard to keep it fresh and add new shine to a increasingly solid game. Well worth a shot!
